channel.title: Chat programe i made :3
channel.description:
hey all... anyway
information: fize size: Ex-small Any computer can use it (well not mac you need two mouse bottons to use) it allows you to connect to my Custom ip to talk to other users
how to use
First off if the Chat server is online you will be able to talk
FOR CONNECTING TO MY CHATROOM step 1: where it says Server Ip put : Lolerscape.no-ip.org Step 1/3/1 : in where it says Host put : 8500 Step 2/3/1 : in where it says Username put your username Step 3/3/1 : move to step 2 Step 2: press connect Step 3: say somthing if it crashes the server is not online Step 4: press info on the programe if u need more info
SETTING UP YOUR OWN CHATROOM step 1: where it says Server Ip put : YOURSERVERADRESS Step 1/3/1 : in where it says Host put : ANY PORT YOU WANT Step 2/3/1 : in where it says Username put your username Step 3/3/1 : move to step 2 Step 2: press HOST Step 3: If it crashes you pressed host twice or someones not online Step 4: press info on the programe if u need more info
V DOWNLOAD LINK V http://echoworldz.invisionplus.net/?mforum=echoworldz&s=24b72e3a2f4e1a7f77bde715cf23d445&act=Attach&type=post&id=800

item.title: Chat programe i made :3
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

hey all… anyway

information:
fize size: Ex-small
Any computer can use it (well not mac you need two mouse bottons to use)
it allows you to connect to my Custom ip to talk to other users

how to use

First off if the Chat server is online you will be able to talk

                   FOR CONNECTING TO MY CHATROOM

step 1: where it says Server Ip put : Lolerscape.no-ip.org
Step 1/3/1 : in where it says Host put : 8500
Step 2/3/1 : in where it says Username put your username
Step 3/3/1 : move to step 2
Step 2: press connect
Step 3: say somthing if it crashes the server is not online
Step 4: press info on the programe if u need more info

                SETTING UP YOUR OWN CHATROOM

step 1: where it says Server Ip put : YOURSERVERADRESS
Step 1/3/1 : in where it says Host put : ANY PORT YOU WANT
Step 2/3/1 : in where it says Username put your username
Step 3/3/1 : move to step 2
Step 2: press HOST
Step 3: If it crashes you pressed host twice or someones not online
Step 4: press info on the programe if u need more info

V DOWNLOAD LINK V
http://echoworldz.invisionplus.net/?mforum=echoworldz&s=24b72e3a2f4e1a7f77bde715cf23d445&act=Attach&type=post&id=800
